availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Tyrrell (Cook County, Illinois, notary public and real estate broker)

body.p: Cook County, Illinois, notary public and real estate broker. Massachusetts native. Married to Lucinda C. Tyrrell. Father of Charles T. Tyrrell, William Tyrrell, Louis H. Tyrrell, Clara Tyrrell, Mary Tyrrell, and Frederick Tyrrell. Clerk in Lake County, Illinois, in 1850. Broker in partnership with Robert C. Wright at Wright & Tyrrell in Chicago from 1859 to 1886. Employed Bridget Pafferty as a servant in Chicago in 1860.
